disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Hextech Munitions.

blurb.value: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

description.value: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are permanently modified to deal 20% AD physical damage and 80% AD magic damage.

description2.value: Innate - The Package: After 8 minutes elapse, The Package is delivered to both corners of Corki's fountain, which he can pick up after channeling for 1 second. Doing so grants him ghosting and one cast of Special Delivery which must be cast before Valkyrie within the next 60 seconds, as well as  40% bonus movement speed out of combat prior to the ability being cast, after which The Package goes on  cooldown before being delivered again.

description3.value: Corki cannot pick up the package while he is unable to cast abilities.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

damagetype.value: Physical / Magic

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * All players are alerted by Corki emitting a global siren upon picking up The Package. Triggering attacks will apply on-hit effects normally. Spellblade damage is converted to magic damage. This effect will not be consumed if Hextech Munitions' magic damage is enough to kill the target. The damage from Runaan's Hurricane's Wind's Fury is affected by Hextech Munitions. Both components apply  life steal even though on-hit magic damage does not usually interact with it. Critical strikes amplify both components' damage. The following table refers for interactions while Corki is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Interrupts Abilities Interrupts Movement Interrupts Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled N/A Interrupted by Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Phosphorus Bomb.

blurb.value: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

description.value: Active: Corki launches a bomb at the target area that explodes upon impact, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

description2.value: The bomb also reveals the area and enemy champions hit for 6 seconds.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Valkyrie.

blurb.value: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

description.value: Active: Corki dashes to the target location, dropping bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds.

description2.value: These patches deal magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within.

leveling2.value: Magic Damage Per Tick:»15 / 22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 (+ 10% AP)«Total Magic Damage:120 / 180 / 240 / 300 / 360 (+ 80% AP)

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Gatling Gun.

blurb.value: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.

description.value: Active: Corki sprays bullets in a frontal cone for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies hit, and reducing the target's  armor and  magic resistance with each tick, stacking up to 8 times, lingering for 2 seconds.

leveling.value: Mixed Damage Per Tick:»7.5 / 10.625 / 13.75 / 16.875 / 20 (+ 10% bonus AD)«Total Mixed Damage:120 / 170 / 220 / 270 / 320 (+ 160% bonus AD)Resistance Reduction Per Tick:»1 / 1.375 / 1.75 / 2.125 / 2.5«Total Resistance Reduction:8 / 11 / 14 / 17 / 20

notes.value:
* The direction of the gun firing changes depending on where Corki is facing.
 Corki will turn to face in the direction of the cursor upon casting Gatling Gun.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Missile Barrage.

blurb.value: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.

description.value: Passive: Corki periodically stocks a missile ammo, up to a maximum of 7, and starts with 7 missile ammo every time he respawns.

description2.value: Active: Corki fires a missile in the target direction that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage in an area.

description3.value: Every third missile Corki fires is a Big One, dealing 100% increased damage with increased range and explosion radius.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* Once Corki has learned the ability, he receives a buff that automatically tracks the number of times he's used his ultimate since the last Big One.
 Since this information is represented as a buff, this information is available to both allies and enemies.

 Corki retains progress towards The Big One when he dies.
 Once Corki has his ultimate, he has an indicator below his health bar that is only visible to him that shows when a Big One will be fired, how many missiles he has in reserve, and how many more missiles he can store.
 Missile Barrage will always fire from the original casting position.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
